column1:
P
LEASE BE AWARE!

T
he 
prevailing 
Showery 
conditions 
are
expected  to  continue  further  due  to  the
atmospheric  disturbance  in  the  vicinity  of
Sri Lanka.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at

times 
in  Western,  Sabaragamuwa,  North-
western and Northern provinces and in Galle,
Matara, Kandy and Nuwara-Eliya districts.
Heavy  showers  above  100mm  are  likely  at

some  places 
in  Western,  Sabaragamuwa,
North-western  and  Northern  provinces  and
in Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at
several places elsewhere during the evening
or night.

T
he  general  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take

adequate  precautions 
to  minimize  damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and
lightning during thundershowers.
